title: Fulfillment Planning
description: In the Fulfillment Planning team you will work on the core system and algorithms that control the flow of fashion items through our Europe-wide logistics network. By applying operational research and machine learning techniques, you will explore new ways to speed up deliveries, increase sustainability and reduce logistic costs. Within a multidisciplinary team of research and engineering, you will work on highly critical systems to the business.
description_lemmatized: fulfillment planning team work core system algorithm control flow fashion item europewide logistics network applying operational research machine learning technique explore new way speed delivery increase sustainability reduce logistic cost within multidisciplinary team research engineering work highly critical system business
